If you're struggling to secure a COVID vaccine appointment in New Jersey, try some of these helpful tips. Keep in mind that CVS and Rite Aid also offer vaccines:

- Check the New Jersey vaccine appointment finder website regularly
- Check with your healthcare provider or local pharmacy
- Sign up for vaccination alerts through NJ Vaccine Scheduling System
- Utilize vaccine appointment finder tools like TurboVax and VaccineFinder
- Join local Facebook groups or subreddits dedicated to vaccine appointment sharing
- Call your county health department for assistance
- Use the NJ Vaccine Appointment Assistance Tool for additional help 
- Consider volunteering at a vaccination site to become eligible for a vaccine appointment 
- Check with your employer or university for vaccination resources 
- Keep trying and be persistent, as appointment availability can change frequently.
